property.name: ipName
property.label: Integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to this header nav.

property.name: inputJSON
property.label: Input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the Integration procedure.

property.name: optionsJSON
property.label: Options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Integration procedure.

property.name: masterbrand
property.label: Masterbrand
property.description: Logo URL for masterbrand, leave empty to keep VIC Government logo.

property.name: masterbrandAlt
property.label: Masterbrand alternative text
property.description: Alternative text to masterbrand logo.

property.name: masterbrandLink
property.label: Masterbrand link
property.description: Target URL when clicking on the masterbrand. Leave empty for community home.

property.name: logo
property.label: Logo
property.description: Logo URL for co-brand, leave empty otherwise.

property.name: logoAlt
property.label: Logo alternative text
property.description: Alternative text to co-brand logo.

property.name: logoLink
property.label: Logo link
property.description: Target URL when clicking on the co-brand logo. Leave empty for community home.

property.name: breakpoint
property.label: Breakpoint
property.description: Breakpoint from vertical to horizontal layout in pixels.

property.name: sticky
property.label: Is sticky
property.description: Indicates that the menu bar is to stay at the top of the viewport when scrolling.

property.name: hideOnScroll
property.label: Hide on scroll
property.description: Indicates that the menu bar is to disappear when scrolling down and reappear when scrolling up.

property.name: label
property.label: Aria label
property.description: Text used as the aria label for the menu.

property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Menu title used both for visually hidden accessible text and the back button label on next-level submenus.

property.name: menuLabel
property.label: Menu label
property.description: Text displayed under the closed menu hamburger icon with a vertical layout screens smaller than the breakpoint.

property.name: closeMenuLabel
property.label: Close menu label
property.description: Text displayed under the open menu hamburger icon with a vertical layout or menu panel close icon with an horizontal layout.

property.name: searchLabel
property.label: Search label
property.description: Text displayed under the search icon. Leave empty to hide search box.

property.name: closeSearchLabel
property.label: Close search label
property.description: Text displayed under the close search icon.

property.name: logoutLabel
property.label: Logout label
property.description: Text displayed under the logout icon. Leave empty to hide logout box.

property.name: quickExitLabel
property.label: Quick exit label
property.description: Label displayed in the quick exit button (to leave the website). Leave empty to hide.

property.name: quickExitTarget
property.label: Quick exit target
property.description: URL of the website to navigate to when quick exiting.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
